title: Salvador Dali The Disintegration of The Persistence of Memory Clock
description:
Clock developed from Salvador Dali’s The Disintegration of The Persistence of Memory, 1952-54. “Exclusive designs, products, images, content, publicity rights and trademarks presented herein belong to The Dalí Museum, St. Petersburg, FL. and The Gala-Dalí Foundation, Figueres, Spain.” 

Embracing both the exact time and the fluid time of memory and art, this clock is a fun and functional time keeper.

  • Dimensions: 6.5 x 4.25 x 6.375 in.
  • Materials: Molded plastic, clock-box mechanism.
  • Set up instructions included.
  • Requires AA: battery not included.
